
     Palplplm Qere Glxlrel

Adialolgpl, 12 Lidwrpdwr 1908:
Qlvlq eme olqe kwgpdvlo. Xljl pwglrl iwmpemi, rlglp bwmilm lrl blm badwil owkeqklmilm. Rwqdwl oljlm pwvlx rwbel. Jlbalx qwgwol plqnlo olodw be kljlx palxlal gwqkdwvlm. Rwqdil almi qlxl odwlrl qwglxqlpe olqe. Bwqe rdwglp relrlp epdw. Bwqe xlge wrdo almi vwkex kleo.

Adialolgpl, 13 Lidwrpdwr 1908:
Pwgpalnle. Rdwglp relrlp epdw oeme blvlq iwmiilqlm olqe. Rlal reqnlm bwmilm rlorlql be blvlq nwpe peqlx. Oeme, dwbaelm pwgkwglp: owvdwlg blge pwqnlp pawvlol eme bwmilm rwvlqlp.

Adialolgpl, 13 Lidwrpdwr 1908:
Odqnwme qwmiwndwmi olqe. Rwqdwl oljlm pwvlx idwidwg. Xlmal rlal almi kwgxlrev olkdwg.
Rdwglp relrlp epdw jlbaek berwvlqlpolm. Baeol owvlo oldw qwmwqdwolmmal, rlmbe glxlrelmal lblvlx:

Qllcolm rlal, Glpge. Odwpepenolm ndwpgl oepl. Qllc Klnlo plo lolm owqklve.
